user.title: Connect to Mycodo
user.description: Enter the details to connect to your Mycodo instance.

description_placeholders.ip_address: The IP address of your Mycodo instance.
description_placeholders.api_key: The API key for authenticating with Mycodo.
description_placeholders.use_https: Enable this to use HTTPS for a secure connection. Disable for HTTP.
description_placeholders.update_interval: Set how often (in minutes) the sensor should update.

error.ip_not_reachable: Could not connect to the provided IP address. Please check if the device is online and the IP is correct.
error.invalid_api_key: The provided API key is invalid or the Mycodo instance did not respond correctly. Please verify your API key and ensure that Mycodo is running.

abort.already_configured: This Mycodo instance is already configured.
abort.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred while setting up the Mycodo integration.
